en.name: Xuantao Nie
en.bio: I am a researcher in the field of AI and healthcare, focusing on facial expression recognition in elderly people with Alzheimer's disease.
researchAreas: Deep Learning for Facial Expression Recognition

recentProjects.title: Facial Expression Recognition for Alzheimer's Detection
recentProjects.description: A project focusing on using deep learning to detect early signs of Alzheimer's disease from facial expressions.

recentProjects.title: Mobile Health Monitoring App
recentProjects.description: Developing a cost-effective mobile application to monitor elderly people's health in real-time.

papers.title: Deep Learning Models for Facial Expression Recognition
AI-Based Early Diagnosis of Alzheimer's Disease

zh.name: Xuantao Nie
zh.bio: 在读研究生，主要研究方向为面部表情识别；Java开发。
researchAreas: 面部表情识别的深度学习
基于计算机视觉的老年人轻度认知障碍检测

recentProjects.title: 面部表情识别用于阿尔茨海默病检测
recentProjects.description: 使用深度学习检测阿尔茨海默病早期迹象的项目。

recentProjects.title: 移动健康监测应用
recentProjects.description: 开发一种成本效益高的移动应用，实时监测老年人健康。

papers.title: 面部表情识别的深度学习模型

papers.title: 基于人工智能的阿尔茨海默病早期诊断
